item.description:
<![CDATA[## YTAudioBar 1.0.2
### 🎵 What's New
### 🔧 Improvements - **Cleaner Interface**: Removed notification functionality for a more streamlined experience - **Consistent Version Display**: Fixed version numbers to show correctly across all UI components - **Reduced Complexity**: Simplified codebase by removing unused notification system
### 🐛 Bug Fixes - Fixed inconsistent version display in About section showing static "1.0.0" instead of actual version - Corrected version fallback values across all app components for consistency
### 📦 Technical Changes - Removed NotificationManager and all notification-related code - Updated version reading logic to use dynamic Bundle information - Cleaned up settings UI by removing notification preferences - Improved app performance by removing background notification processing
### 📋 System Requirements
- **macOS**: 13.0 (Ventura) or later - **Architecture**: Intel and Apple Silicon Macs supported - **Dependencies**: Automatically downloaded on first launch

item.title: Version 1.0.0
item.description:
<![CDATA[# YTAudioBar v1.0.0 - Initial Release
🎉 **Welcome to YTAudioBar!** - A beautiful macOS menu bar app for YouTube audio streaming.
## ✨ Features
### 🎵 Core Audio - YouTube audio streaming with high-quality playback - Smart queue management with drag & drop - Playback speed controls (0.5x - 2.0x) - Audio wave visualization - Seek controls and progress tracking
### 🔍 Search & Discovery - Integrated YouTube search - Real-time search suggestions - Thumbnail display with proper aspect ratios
### 💾 Downloads & Storage - High-quality audio downloads - Local file playback with priority - Download progress tracking - Smart file management
### ❤️ Favorites & Playlists - Advanced playlist system - Folder-based organization - Many-to-many track relationships - Quick heart button for favoriting
### 🎨 User Interface - Modern macOS menu bar integration - Spotify-inspired minimized player - Smooth animations and transitions - Native SwiftUI throughout
### ⚙️ Settings & Updates - Automatic dependency management - Auto-updates for yt-dlp - App update notifications - Comprehensive settings panel
## 📋 System Requirements
- **macOS**: 13.0 (Ventura) or later - **Architecture**: Universal (Intel + Apple Silicon) - **Internet**: Required for streaming and initial setup - **Storage**: ~50MB for app + dependencies
## 🚀 Installation
1. Download `YTAudioBar-1.0.0.dmg` 2. Open the DMG and drag YTAudioBar to Applications 3. Launch YTAudioBar from Applications 4. Allow dependencies to download on first launch 5. Enjoy streaming YouTube audio from your menu bar!
## 🔄 What's Next
This is the initial release. Future updates will include: - Enhanced search filters - Keyboard shortcuts - Export/import playlists - Additional audio formats
---
**Download**: [YTAudioBar-1.0.0.dmg](https://github.com/ilyassan/YTAudioBar-macos/releases/download/v1.0.0/YTAudioBar-1.0.0.dmg)
**GitHub**: https://github.com/ilyassan/YTAudioBar-macos ]]>
